name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.7.1
- New art! Thanks to i like trains and Kaamalauppias!
- Ritual-related things now recognize Cultist Potion's ritual effect.
- Removed Ritual Potion now that Cultist Potion exists.
- Fix crash when playing with zhs language.
- Sacrifice now uses Fatal keyword.
- Various cards now use card preview feature.
- Survival Instinct now glows when playable.
- Minor card/tooltip rewording.
- Beaked keywords should no longer show up on other mods' cards when not intended.

0.7.0
- Updated for StS 2.0.

0.6.7
- Fixed Sacred Deck crash with Animator mod (thanks to Aphid for the detailed report!)
- Fixed a crash when picking up Vigor Burst.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
